data.title: How much do Xingtai Capital Management Ltd employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Xingtai Capital Management Ltd is estimated to be approximate $82,960 per year. The majority pay is between $72,768 to $94,003 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Xingtai Capital Management Ltd salary, Xingtai Capital Management Ltd pay rate, and more.
data.text:
View salary at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Xingtai Capital Management Ltd jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Chief Operating Officer jobs at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd earn the most with an average annual salary of $374,624, while Investment Associate jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $75,586.

The estimate average salary for Xingtai Capital Management Ltd employees is around $82,960 per year, or the hourly rate of Xingtai Capital Management Ltd rate is $40. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $94,003. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employee’s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.

DISCLAIMER: The salary range presented here is an estimation that has been derived from our proprietary algorithm. It should be noted that this range does not originate from the company's factual payroll records or survey data.

1. How much does Xingtai Capital Management Ltd in the United States pay?

Xingtai Capital Management Ltd pays its employees an average of $82,960 per year. The average salary at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd range from $72,768 to $94,003 per year. Chief Operating Officer jobs at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd earn the most with an average annual salary of $374,624, while Investment Associate jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $75,586.

2. Do Xingtai Capital Management Ltd employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd is lesser than NewRetirement Inc. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd is $94,003 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at NewRetirement Inc is $125,890 per year.

3. How much does Xingtai Capital Management Ltd pay compared to NewRetirement Inc?

The average annual salary at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd is $82,960, or an hourly wage of $40, in comparison to NewRetirement Inc which pays $111,091 per year or $53 per hour.

4. Which job skills can boost an Investment Analyst salary at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd?

Planning, Analysis and Products and Services are key to an Investment Analyst job at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd. Possessing these skills could lead to a higher salary. You can learn and develop high income skills now if you’re looking for a position at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd.

5. What is the lowest salary at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd?

The lowest paying job at Xingtai Capital Management Ltd is Investment Associate with an annual salary of $75,586 or an hourly rate of $40.
